text: Bellaspira tricolor is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusc in the family Drilliidae.Bouchet, P. (2016). Bellaspira tricolor Fallon, 2016. In: MolluscaBase (2015). Accessed through: World Register of Marine Species at http://www.marinespecies.org/aphia.php?p=taxdetails&id;=871901 on 2016-07-27 ==Description== The size of an adult shell varies between 2.4 mm and 7 mm. ==Distribution== This species occurs in the Caribbean Sea off Guadeloupe. ==References== * Fallon P.J. (2016). Taxonomic review of tropical western Atlantic shallow water Drilliidae (Mollusca: Gastropoda: Conoidea) including descriptions of 100 new species. Zootaxa. 4090(1): 1–363 ==External links== * tricolor Category:Gastropods described in 2016
title: Bellaspira tricolor
